sentences.en: Any widely public library can be considered more or less unchangeable.
sentences.cn: 任何广泛发行的类库可以或多或少认为是不可改变的.

sentences.en: But this man, because he continueth ever , hath an unchangeable priesthood.
sentences.cn: 24这位既是永远长存的, 他祭司的职任, 就长久不更换.

sentences.en: Considering quality as own life is our unchangeable thought.
sentences.cn: 视产品质量如同生命,这是我们一贯不变的初衷.

sentences.en: His heart , that loved and pitied, is a heart of unchangeable tenderness.
sentences.cn: 他那爱人怜悯人的心, 是一颗永不改变的仁慈之心.

sentences.en: I consider this an unchangeable truth.
sentences.cn: 我认为这是一条不易的定理.

sentences.en: I consider this is an unchangeable truth.
sentences.cn: 我认为这是一条不容置疑的真理.

sentences.en: If the electric field added is unchangeable, what produces is the direct current.
sentences.cn: 如果所加的电场不变, 产生的是直流电.

sentences.en: Individualism is pure and unchangeable element in Libai's paradoxical and intricate idealism. "
sentences.cn: 以个体为中心,是李白矛盾复杂的思想 意识 中单纯不变的精神基因.

sentences.en: Such being the case , is this situation unchangeable?
sentences.cn: 就是这样.但, 只能这样 吗 ?

sentences.en: The relation between language and its meaning is not rigid , unchangeable.
sentences.cn: 摘要语言与其意义之间的联系不是固定的、僵死的.

sentences.en: With an exclamation of impatience, but with his Unchangeable face, Monseigneur looked out.
sentences.cn: 大人发出一声不耐烦的惊叹, 那张不动声色的脸往外望了望.

words.tran_cn: 不变的；不能改变的；安定的

trans.tran_en: Something that is unchangeable cannot be changed at all
